definition: to go to work/to be on duty/to start work/to go to the office
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
see 上聲|上声[shang3 sheng1]
team/class/squad/work shift/ranking/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for groups
surname Ban
office workers (as social group)
time of going to work/the morning rush hour

sentences.english: I used to go to work by bike. (But I don't anymore, now. )
sentences.chinese: 我过去常骑自行车上班。

sentences.english: If you spend long hours at work a dog is not for you.
sentences.chinese: 如果你花长时间在上班那你就不适合养狗。

sentences.english: When his father fell ill, Tom rushed home from work.
sentences.chinese: 当爸爸生病，汤姆快速从上班的地方奔回了家。

sentences.english: I oversleep again this morning and was almost late for work.
sentences.chinese: 本日早上又睡过甚了，上班差点迟到。

sentences.english: He's here but he's not at his dest right now.
sentences.chinese: 他有来上班，不过现在不在座位上。

sentences.english: I have to work at daytime, so going to evening classes is the best choice for me.
sentences.chinese: 白天我要上班，所以上夜校是一个很好的选择。

sentences.english: Today's Yang Lin's first day back from China.
sentences.chinese: 今天杨琳从中国回来，第一天上班。

sentences.english: Scorching temperatures don't give you license to bare your midriff, flash cleavage, or wear short shorts.
sentences.chinese: 酷热的天气没有给你袒胸露乳，穿短裤上班的权利。

sentences.english: Today, I was driving to work and I had to pee really badly.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我开车去上班，有点内急。

sentences.english: Ben: It was all so clinical. Mom, how come you had to go back to work?
sentences.chinese: 这不过是临床上的。妈妈，为啥你非去上班不可呢？

sentences.english: Jason usually punches in around 8:50 a.m.
sentences.chinese: 杰生通常大约在早上八点五十打卡上班。

sentences.english: She takes the bus to work, whereas I take the subway.
sentences.chinese: 她搭公车上班，而我则搭地铁。

sentences.english: Every morning he gets up very early to work and gets home late.
sentences.chinese: 天天早上他都是很夙起床往上班，很晚才回家。

sentences.english: First day at work, Ouyang went to the office to arrange Hao relics.
sentences.chinese: 上班的第一天，欧阳去办公室整理昊的遗物。

sentences.english: I take the train to go to work this morning and the conductor did not want to take my train ticket.
sentences.chinese: 今晨我程火车上班，车掌先生不要剪我的车票。

definition: to finish work/to get off work
to start and finish work
time of going to work/the morning rush hour
to work overtime
to go to school/to attend school
to go on an official or business trip
to leave early and return late (idiom)
to request leave of absence
to work/to be employed
to go out/to leave home/to go on a journey/away from home/(of a woman) to get married
office workers (as social group)
to go back to one's roots/to return to one's native place/by ext. to join one's ancestors (i.e. to die)
to work a temporary or casual job/(of students) to have a job outside of class time, or during vacation
rush hour
to have a holiday or vacation
early morning/CL:個|个[ge4]
